sentences.english: Even so, some teachers still gave us homework.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，有些老師還是佈置了寒假作業。

sentences.english: Because i have a lot of housework.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我有很多的寒假作業還沒做完。

sentences.english: The curriculum centred on the extra class of winter vacation in January.
sentences.chinese: 一月份的課程集中在寒假的加課上。

sentences.english: Because we are taking winter recess now, no one will take care of them.
sentences.chinese: 因爲已經放寒假了，沒人照顧他們。

sentences.english: like right before our winter break.
sentences.chinese: 恰好在我們的寒假前夕。

sentences.english: I think you submit over winter break, sometime around then.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得你可以在寒假左右提交申請。

sentences.english: Lucy and Ann are going to visit the Great Wall next winter holiday, too.
sentences.chinese: 露西和安也打算下一個寒假去參觀長城。

sentences.english: A few days ago I flew to Anchorage , Alaska to visit friends and relatives and celebrate winter break.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天我坐飛機來安克雷其拜訪親朋好友和慶祝寒假。

sentences.english: During my summer vair conditioner I was employed in the air conditionercounting depcreative artment of a Chemicing Company.
sentences.chinese: 在寒假時代，曾受僱於某化學公司會計部。

sentences.english: From the sixteenth of January to the seventh of February is our Winter Holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我們的寒假放假時間是從一月十六號截至到二月七日。

sentences.english: and I applied early and committed over winter break.
sentences.chinese: 我提前申請並在寒假被錄取。

sentences.english: Most of the passengers are college students on their winter  vacation and  migrant workers returning home for Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 大多數乘客是放寒假的大學生和返鄉過年的農民工。

sentences.english: The CYC 's activities during winter vacation, for example, are very popular.
sentences.chinese: 例如，在寒假期間中國青年團的活動非常受歡迎。

sentences.english: My school has 3 weeks for winter vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我學校寒假放三個星期。

sentences.english: The winter holidays begins next month.
The American winter holiday season begins when thanksgiving ends.
sentences.chinese: 美國的寒假就是在感恩節結束後開始的。

definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to have a holiday or vacation
third year in junior middle school
2nd year in junior middle school/2nd day of a lunar month/2nd day of lunar New Year
